items.title: Reina Nightclub attacked in Istanbul, Turkey
description: At least 39 people were killed in a nightclub, Reina, in Istanbul, Turkey.
A gunman opened fire at around 22:30 GMT as people celebrated the new year.
At least 69 people in total were treated in hospital.

items.title: Man Tortured on Facebook Live
description: Police in Chicago, USA have arrested four suspects after a Facebook Live Broadcast appeared to show a man bound, gagged and attacked.
Several people are shown taunting and assaulting the man while he was sitting in a room, restrained and his mouth taped shut.

items.title: Shooting at Fort Lauderdale, Florida
description: A gunman has shot and killed five people at a Florida airport.
Eight other people were injured in the shooting.
The suspect was taken into custody without any further shots being fired.

items.title: Truck driven into pedestrians in Jerusalem, Israel
description: Four soldiers have been killed in Jerusalem, Israel.
15 people in total have been injured.
The driver of the truck was immediately shot dead.

items.title: Car bomb explosion in Baghdad, Iraq
description: 11 people have been killed and dozens more injured.
The bomb was set off in a vegetable market.
The Islamic State (IS) has claimed responsibility behind the blast.

items.title: 2 Bombings Near Government Offices in Afghan Capital Kill 38
description: Two large bombs — one triggered by a suicide attacker — exploded near government offices.
The 38 dead included civilians and military personnel, and another 72 people were wounded.
Among the wounded was Rahima Jami, a member of parliament from Herat province in western Afghanistan.
